    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/110960</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/110960</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Družinsko drevo - anketa</string>
            <string language="en">Family tree - poll</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stammbaum - Abstimmung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arbre de famille - balayage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Árvore de família - votação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Albero di famiglia - scrutinio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικογενειακό δέντρο - ψηφοφορία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Árbol de familia - encuesta</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Uporabite lahko posamezne delovne liste ali ves komplet. Delo je lahko skupinsko, vsaka skupina pokrije svoje področje. Dogovorimo se za anketiranje enakih sorodnikov (dedkov ali babic, očetov ali mamic) in potem primerjamo dobljene odgovore. Listom lahko dodamo fotografije oseb ali krajev, od koder izvirajo. Izpolnjene ankete so tudi primerne za razstavo.</string>
            <string language="en">Building your own family tree and question one of your relative to fill in the poll.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">anketa</string>
            <string language="en">poll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">družinsko drevo</string>
            <string language="en">family tree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">otroštvo</string>
            <string language="en">childhood</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ihren eigenen Stammbaum aufbauend und fragen Sie 
ein von Ihrem relative.to ausfüllen die Abstimmung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En construisant votre propre arbre de famille et 
interrogez un de votre relatif complètent le balayage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Construindo sua própria árvore de família e 
questione um do seu relative.to preenchem a votação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Costruendo il vostro proprio albero di famiglia 
ed interroghi uno del vostro relativo riempono lo scrutinio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χτίζοντας το οικογενειακό δέντρο και την ερώτησή σας 
ένα από το σας σχετικά με την αφθονία στην ψηφοφορία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Construyendo su propio árbol de familia y 
pregunte uno de su en relación con completan la encuesta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstimmung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stammbaum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kindheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">balayage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arbre de famille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">enfance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">votação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">árvore de família</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">infância</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scrutinio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">albero di famiglia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">infanzia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ψηφοφορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικογενειακό δέντρο</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
